page.title: 01Local area I
page.content:
Forest Lodge School is a comprensive school with 900 pupils & 65 staff.The area covered in the survey is mainly rural and on the Northern edge of the London Boro' of Havering.
There are 2 interesting amenity areas within the section.These are Havering Park & Hainault Forest.
Of particular interest to the pupils of the school were the stables that operate in or near these parks.
During the Summer of 1985 the school ran a 'Marafun' which included a route through Havering Park,along Lodge Lane,through Lower Park Farm,and across the Golf Course returning to school via Lodge Lane.
